info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Transylvania County through 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Brevard, or near Rosman, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Rosman, Dupont State Forest, Connestee, Little River In Transylvania County and Penrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
